message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to make a counteroffer of $7500.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $8500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8000.
